summary: The diff implements most of the 8 requirements: all 6 tool components (REQ-1 through REQ-6), voice input via Web Speech API (REQ-7), and dark-themed sidebar layout (REQ-8). However, several specific acceptance criteria have gaps, particularly around the deterministic/rule-based backend logic, missing image assets, and a 7th tool discrepancy.

missing_requirements.requirement: The Brand Name Generator backend logic must be deterministic rule-based and avoid generic terms like Tech, Solutions, or Company â€” generation must reflect the provided inputs
missing_requirements.reason: The backend in main.mo returns the same hardcoded static list of 15 names regardless of Industry, Keywords, or Brand Tone inputs. There is no rule-based logic tied to the inputs.

missing_requirements.requirement: Each Instagram caption must include relevant hashtags and a call-to-action
missing_requirements.reason: The backend returns static captions with hashtags but no explicit call-to-action per caption (e.g., 'Transform your brand #Innovation #Branding #Growth' has no CTA). The requirement specifies each caption must include a call-to-action.

missing_requirements.requirement: Sentiment analysis must classify the review text as Positive, Negative, or Neutral based on the content with a 1-2 sentence explanation
missing_requirements.reason: The backend always returns #neutral regardless of input text. There is no rule-based logic to determine sentiment from the review content.

missing_requirements.requirement: BizForge AI chatbot responses must be structured and avoid generic answers, varying based on the branding question asked
missing_requirements.reason: The backend always returns the same static hardcoded response regardless of the question. There is no rule-based logic to vary responses based on different branding questions.

missing_requirements.requirement: Images required: BizForge AI wordmark logo bizforge-logo.dim_400x120.png
missing_requirements.reason: No image asset file for the BizForge AI wordmark logo was added in the diff. The sidebar uses an inline Flame SVG icon instead of the required logo image asset.

missing_requirements.requirement: Sidebar navigation allows switching between all 7 tools
missing_requirements.reason: The spec requires 7 tools but only 6 ToolId values and 6 nav items are defined in Sidebar.tsx. App.tsx also only renders 6 tool views. One tool is missing from the navigation.

hallucinated_features.description: Copy-to-clipboard buttons on individual brand name results
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention copy functionality for brand names. The BrandNameGenerator implements per-item copy buttons.

hallucinated_features.description: Suggested example reviews in the Sentiment Analyzer
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention pre-filled example reviews. The SentimentAnalyzer provides 3 clickable example review shortcuts.

hallucinated_features.description: Suggested questions panel in the BizForge AI Chatbot
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention pre-suggested questions. The BrandingChatbot renders a list of 4 clickable suggested questions.
